result.pre: the mental health outcomes related to climate change can include:
result.post: (PTSD), anxiety, depression, complicated grief and survivor guilt, recovery

result.pre: mental health resources to support communities during and following emergencies,
result.post: outbreaks, and climate-related disasters (see [ 71]). Emergency preparedness

result.pre: K.L. Lindgren E. Suk J.E. Semenza J.C. Adaptation to the
result.post: impacts of climate change Clim. Chang. 2013 118 355
